StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetExternalUserList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@UserID varchar(30) = NULL, @UserGroup varchar(100) = NULL AS
SELECT L.USER_ID, COALESCE(L.FULL_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS FULL_NAME, LOWER(COALESCE(L.MCRISS_USER_GROUP, SPACE(0))) AS MCRISS_USER_GROUP, COALESCE(U.MCC_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS MCC_CODE, COALESCE(RO.SHORT_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS SHORT_NAME, COALESCE(RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, 0) AS ORGANIZATION_ID FROM EXTERNAL_USER_LIST L LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_LIST U ON L.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON U.MCC_CODE = RO.MCC_CODE WHERE L.USER_ID = COALESCE(@UserID, L.USER_ID) AND L.MCRISS_USER_GROUP = COALESCE(@UserGroup, L.MCRISS_USER_GROUP) ORDER BY L.USER_ID
